text: Kanave Kalayathe () is an album sung by Sachin Warrierhttp://www.saavn.com/s/song/tamil/Kanave-Kalayathe starring Leon Poulose, Swetha Raj, Akash Thomas, NeethuKrishna VR, Christy Vazhapilly and Althaf. The soundtrack was composed by Abee Joe.http://www.mathrubhumi.com/youth/cambuzz/kanave-kalayathe-tamil-music- video-sachin-warrier-abee-joe-mageswaran-1.1906231 It was produced by Nidhinsha and distribruted by Muzik247.https://gaana.com/song/kanave-kalayathe The music video is directed by Deen Shifaz and Ashith wilson.http://english.manoramaonline.com/entertainment/music/2017/04/18/romantic- tamil-music-video-sung-by-sachin-warrier.html == Music-soundtrack == The song is composed by Abee Joe, Recorded and mastered at MyStudio, Ernakulam. Lyrics by Mageswaran.http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp- metroplus/music-for-friendship/article18346047.ece == References == ==External links== * * * Apple iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/kanave- kalayathe-from-kanave-kalayathe-single/id1228106704 * Gaana: http://gaana.com/song/kanave-kalayathe Category:Malayalam music albums Category:World music albums by Indian artists Category:2017 albums
title: Kanave Kalayathe
